title: New Zealand's Steve Hansen: Cancelling these World Cup matches was an easy call - even Donald Trump could have made it
text:
Steve Hansen, the New Zealand head coach, described the decision to cancel matches in Japan under threat from Typhoon Hagibis as so obvious that even Donald Trump would have made the correct decision.

The cancellation of the All Blacks’ final pool match has not stopped the defending champions from topping Pool B, finishing a point ahead of South Africa even with their match against Italy being recorded as a 0-0 draw.

One minor knock-on effect has been that the cancelled match prevents Brodie Retallick and Jack Goodhue from getting more minutes under their belts following their returns...
description: Steve Hansen, the New Zealand head coach, described the decision to cancel matches in Japan under threat from Typhoon Hagibis as so obvious that even Donald Trump would have made the correct decision.
